title: Dudes Down Under
description: It is a secluded island of dreams, of peace, of passion, out by the Great Barrier Reef, and the first visitors to the newly-opened 'Dudes Down Under' are Hollywood 'A' listers intent on luxuriating with their lovers in a secret location away from prying eyes.Paradise.OK, so also in residence are a talk show host, several of their ex-wives and an alcoholic twenty-eight foot crocodile with attitude called Cyril.He-he!But what could really go wrong?Love is in the air.Isn't it?Well it could be something else ...
author: Suzannah Burke
